item.title: A fortune cookie for Behat
item.description: A lost ounce of gold may be found, a lost moment of time never. When you run bin/behat and everything is green, you only get the warm fuzzy feeling of a work well done. Why not reward yourself a bit more ? Some show Chuck Norris giving the thumbs-up. Most don’t show anything special. Enters the fortune cookie. To be sure of hitting the target, shoot first and, whatever you hit, call it the target.
